memberdef.name: NODE_API_MODULE
memberdef.initializer: static napi_value __napi_##regfunc(napi_env env, napi_value exports) { \ return Napi::RegisterModule(env, exports, regfunc); \ } \ NAPI_MODULE(modname, __napi_##regfunc)

memberdef.name: NODE_API_NAMED_ADDON
memberdef.initializer: static napi_value __napi_##classname(napi_env env, napi_value exports) { \ return Napi::RegisterModule(env, exports, &classname::Init); \ } \ NAPI_MODULE(modname, __napi_##classname)
